name: Quietbar
changelog:
10.0:
 • Added support for Safari Technology Preview, Vivaldi, Google Chrome, Google Chrome Canary, and Chromium.
 • New icons including supported browser indicators.
 • Added error dialog to work around automation permissions bug.
 • Fixed version comparison bug in software updater script.
 • Reordered checking for updates to avoid delayed startup.
 • Changed method of detecting running browsers for better performance.

9.6:
 • Fixed bug in updater script that shows an error instead of telling you that it is up to date.

9.5:
 • Updater Script is now standalone and localized.
 • Fixed layout bug of release notes to replace newlines correctly.

9.4:
 • Fixed bug where VLC would be used when selected even if it was uninstalled, now defaults to Embed if VLC has disappeared or does not respond.
 • Software updater script now times out after 5 seconds to avoid delayed launching.
 • Quietbar now can do absolutely nothing when disabled.

9.3:
 • Resized Quietube, Embed and Download icons for consistency with VLC.
 • Automatically detects VLC without needing to relaunch.
 • New updated software updater script can read and display release notes.
longDescription:
Never watch a video with ads again!


Quietbar automatically isolates any YouTube video with your choice of three players to remove ads and interruptions.

Supports YouTube videos, playlists and live streams, simply install Quietbar, click on any YouTube video, and let it do it's thing!

Supported Browsers


Safari

Safari Technology Preview

Vivaldi

Google Chrome

Google Chrome Canary

Chromium

Coming Soon


Mozilla Firefox

Mozilla Firefox Nightly
